Posts.Content: Jul 12, 2015 10:19PM Calandergirl wrote: I understand and can relate to being told "you're too young". First and foremost a great big hug; and as you well know - you are your best advocate. I would have to agree about the ultrasound. I was lucky enough to get an ultrasound the first time I had a lump and it was also used again when they did my biopsies for that lump.
Posts.Title: Feel put down due to my age kaylaee22 edwards750
